tool_description: Text2Knowledge is a fast and accurate open information extraction API with built-in named entity recognition for automated processing of textual data.
name: Text2Knowledge
title: Text2Knowledge

api_list.name: analyze
api_list.description: Extract valuable information from your data.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text2knowledge.p.rapidapi.com/analyze"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text2knowledge.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://text2knowledge.p.rapidapi.com/analyze"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text2knowledge.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
